text: Neutuleh keu lon ureueng meutuah Neutuleh kamoe got lam donya nyoe Meunan cit dudoe akhirat nyang sah Jinoe bak Droeneuh ka kamoe toubat Neukheun treuk ingat keunong musibah ‘Azeueb Lon keunong bak soe nyang hʻeut Lon Teuma rahmat Lon leupah that luah Rahmat Lon leupah jilop beurangho Hana meu saho pih nyang han leupah Akan Lon tuleh keu soe nyang takwa Zakeuet hareuta jitem peusiblah Jijok keu ureueng nyang hak teurimong Lom jimeuiman keu ayat Allah Keu ayat Kamoe dum jimeuiman
